name: AnimationPlaybackController
desc: A controller that manages animation playback.

items.name: var isPlaying: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the animation plays.

items.name: var isStopped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the animation stopped.

items.name: var isValid: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the animation controller is functional.

items.name: var blendFactor: Float
items.desc: The level of influence the controller gives to its animation.

items.name: var isComplete: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the animation has finished running.

items.name: var isPaused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the animation is paused.

items.name: var entity: Entity?
items.desc: The entity to which the animation applies.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The length of time the animation spans, in seconds.

items.name: var clock: CMClockOrTimebase
items.desc: A reference clock to synchronize the animation with other events.

items.name: var time: TimeInterval
items.desc: The animation's location within the timeline.

items.name: static func == (AnimationPlaybackController, AnimationPlaybackController) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two animation playback controllers are equal.

items.name: static func != (AnimationPlaybackController, AnimationPlaybackController) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two animation playback controllers aren't equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the controller by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the controller.
